Controllers Documentation¶

Documentation for MyMusic OpenSource music sharing software. These are the controllers.

The admin Module¶

The friends Module¶

class mymusic.controllers.friends.FriendsController[source]¶

Controller which connects to the Facebook API and checks your friends list and verifies if the logged in user is your facebook friend.

index()[source]¶

Returns true if the admin and logged in user are facebook friends

The search Module¶

class mymusic.controllers.search.SearchController[source]¶

Search page for searching songs via ajax.

index()[source]¶

Returns string of ids of songs that match the search request.
